home-2: - Click on the Dutch or English button to change the language!
home-3: Click the Average Graph button in the picture or at the top of the navigation bar to see more averages (difficulty and fun) in a bar and line graph!
home-4: - Click the Individual Assessments button at the top of the navigation bar to see the student results and hover over the bar graph to see the difficulty and enjoyment results.
average-h3: Scroll down for the line graph
average-h3-line: Scroll up for the bar graph
